title: Conquering Fear & Past Trauma with Gabrielle Bernstein
body:
In this lesson, Gabrielle Bernstein, renowned motivational speaker, life coach, and NY Times best-selling author, takes us through the importance of reconditioning our thought process. How we all need to realign ourselves with the love we all have within us and rediscover our true selves.

In this interview, you’ll learn:
- How control leads to fear
- The steps to take in order to conquer fear and past trauma
- What blocks us from our highest joy
- What questions we should be asking ourselves in order to reach breakthrough
- The importance of spiritual awareness
- The root cause of addictive behaviour
- Different techniques to bring about healing
teaser: In this lesson, Gabrielle Bernstein, renowned motivational speaker, life coach, and NY Times best-selling author, takes us through the importance of reconditioning our thought process.

title: 10 Keys to Unlock Your Full Potential with Jim Kwik
body:
In this lesson, Jim Kwik, a world leader in accelerated learning, breaks down the 10 most important keys to unlocking your true potential. And how, unlocking these keys will not only improve your state of mind, but be beneficial for your physical health too.

In this interview, you will learn:
- ANTS: What it is, and how to kill it
- The transition from negative thinking to positive thinking
- How moving your body can do wonders for your brain
- The art of brain breaks - what they are and how to put them into practice
teaser: Jim Kwik, a world leader in accelerated learning, breaks down the 10 important keys to unlocking your true potential. Each of these ten is not only good for your mental health but your physical health as well.

title: Routines and Habits to ‘Level-Up’ Your Learning with Jim Kwik
body:
In this lesson, Jim Kwik, the world leader in accelerated learning, provides us with the simple tricks to up our learning game and speaks about how we all need to uncover our true potential. Jim, also shares his daily rituals to learning faster and smarter and teaches us that keeping great habits can lead to success.

In this interview, you will learn:
- How to ‘win’ each day
- How the smallest habits can lead to success
- Small challenges to build brain muscle
- About the best foods for your brain
- The formula that leads to success with new habits
- The three major challenges we face in our modern society that slow our ability to learn
teaser: In this lesson, Jim Kwik, the world leader in accelerated learning, provides us with the simple tricks to up our learning game and speaks about how we all need to uncover our true potential.

title: Shifting Limiting Beliefs with Marie Forleo
body:
In this lesson, Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author and life coach, guides us through how we can seperate ourselves from our limiting beliefs that could be holding us back from our true potential.
In the words of Marie, “It is our beliefs that drive our actions, and our actions drive our destiny, so our beliefs are actually of paramount importance.”

In this interview, you’ll learn:
- What is a limiting belief
- The clues that point to limiting beliefs being present in our lives
- What Marie did to push past a belief she had for many years
- The complete ‘how to’ on changing those limiting beliefs
teaser: Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author, life coach, and host of Marie TV, guides us through getting rid of those beliefs that could be holding you back. It is our beliefs that drive our actions, and our actions drive our destiny, so our beliefs are actually of paramount importance.

title: Goal Setting with Marie Forleo
body:
In this short lesson, Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author and life coach will undress the art of goal setting and give you the need-to-know steps to creating practical goals that are actually achievable. From visualizing to implementing, this lesson will have you kicking your goals in no time.

In this interview, you’ll learn:
- The questions to ask yourself when setting goals
- What can push you towards setting those goals, the good and the bad
- How to write your goals in a way that moves you
- How to keep things practical and achievable
teaser: In this short clip, Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author, life coach, and host of Marie TV, give practical steps to setting goals that work for you.

title: Starting Your Day with Wim Hof
body:
In this lesson, Wim Hof, better known as the Ice Man, explains the methodology behind his breathing technique that helps him withstand extremes temperatures and protects him from everyday viruses. In addition, Wim shares simples practices that you too can implement in your life to embody the method.

In this interview, you will learn:
- The ultimate morning breath work routine
- How breathing awakens the immune and vascular system
- Why you should be taking cold showers every day
- Daily routines to create an internal defense system
- How to be the master of yourself
teaser: In this lesson, Wim Hof, better known as the Ice Man, explains the methodology behind his breathing technique that helps him withstand extremes temperatures and protects him from everyday viruses.

title: Foods to Avoid & Include for Gut Health with Tom O'Bryan
body:
Join metabolic and autoimmune specialist, Dr. Tom O’Bryan, as he dives into all things gut health. As new research emerges, we are learning more about the gut’s role in the body’s overall health. It is known that, the gut is the chief gatekeeper and regulator for what enters our bloodstream. With this knowledge in mind, it is no surprise our gut health is attributable to many diseases, especially those of the autoimmune kind. Follow along as Dr. Tom O’Bryan explains the inner workings of the gut, what leads to autoimmune disease, and how you can use certain foods to start the process of healing from the inside.

In this interview, you will learn:
- What intestinal permeability is and the transfer into the bloodstream
- How quickly your gut lining can rebuild
- The causation of intestinal permeability
- The immune response that occurs a result of high gut permeability
- What can tear your gut lining - and it’s not just food!
- What leads to Hashimoto’s thyroiditis disease
- Food to increase good bacteria and food for the bacteria.
- The steps you need to take in order to strengthen the gut wall
teaser: Join metabolic and autoimmune specialist, Dr. Tom O’Bryan, as he dives into all things gut health. The gut controls much of the overall health of the body, acting as the gatekeeper for what goes into the bloodstream.

title: Tapping into Your Internal Wisdom with Marie Forleo
body:
In this lesson, Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author and life coach speaks about the internal wisdom that is present within us all and how tapping into this inner guidance can do wonders for our life’s trajectory. Marie, will also share her daily non-negotiables she makes time for every single day to stay proactive and fulfilled and how you too can define yours.

In this interview, you’ll learn:
- Daily habits that keep you on your track every day
- What intuition is and how to listen to it
- The difference between fear and intuition
- How and where to find clarity
- What are your non-negotiables
teaser: Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author, life coach, and host of Marie TV takes us through the non-negotiables she makes time for every single day to keep her proactive and successful.

title: Share Your Mission with the World with Marie Forleo
body:
In this lesson, Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author and life coach talks about activating your purpose, and how you can start doing it now, no matter what stage of life you’re in.
Marie says, “That every moment that you’re alive, you’re making a difference, it is up to you whether you are living in that and choosing to make a positive difference.”

In this interview, you’ll learn:
- The effect of your energy output
- Steps to bring your purpose to life
- The importance of a good attitude
- The simple things Marie does to bring her vision to life
teaser: Marie Forleo, NY Times best-selling author, life coach, and host of Marie TV talks about activating your purpose, and how you can start doing it now, no matter what stage of life you’re in.

title: Off the Court with Novak Djokovic
body:
In this lesson, Novak Djokovic, 20 times tennis Grand Slam champion, speaks openly about his road to success and how he attributes his potency on the court and happiness off the court to refining and cleaning up his diet. From moving towards a plant-based diet and experimenting with juicing, Novak shares the key diet changes that have helped him discover the healthiest version of himself.

In this interview, you will learn:
- The optimal time to detox each day
- Why Novak chooses to eat mostly plant-based
- Different juice combinations and their benefits
- Novak’s signature smoothie blends
teaser: Novak Djokovic, 20 times tennis Grand Slam champion, give us the ins and outs of how he eats for success, on and off the court.

title: Expanding Awareness Through Meditation with Michael Beckwith
body:
How do you exist in this life? In what ways do you continue to show up? In this Masterclass lesson, Rev. Michael Beckwith, a New Thought minister, best-selling author, and founder of the Agape International Spiritual Center, explains how you can use meditation and prayer to expand your awareness. How you can invite a state of gratitude, discover your intrinsic self, and ultimately become a law of being. 

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

—How to have dominion over your intention.
—The difference between contemplative, existential, and spiritual meditation, and how this invites a state of gratitude, presence, and unity.
—Ways to manifest your vision and grow in life.
—What you need to let go of what no longer serves you, and the steps to moving forward.
—How to use meditation to affirm your passion, and allow for new opportunities to unfold.
teaser: How do you exist in this life? In what ways do you continue to show up? Rev. Michael Beckwith explains how you can use meditation and prayer to expand your awareness.

title: Tapping Away Anxiety & Stress with Nick Ortner
body:
Have you been itching to discover how you can use tapping in your life? In this Masterclass lesson, Nick Ortner, creator, and author of The Tapping Solution, will explain how tapping can be effective for pain, stress and anxiety. You’ll  uncover the exciting history of Tapping and how it has evolved into the profound practice of today.

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— How tapping works and its effectiveness. 
— The Discovery of tapping in 1980 and how it was used to help a woman overcome a water phobia.
— How tapping compares to traditional cognitive therapies. 
— The role of Traditional Chinese Medicine in the discovery of tapping.
— How the practice produces a physiological effect on our bodies.
— The difference between various other therapies and tapping.
— Emerging research of the last decade and the evidence for anxiety and PTSD management in veterans.
teaser: Have you been itching to discover how you can use tapping in your life? Nick Ortner, author of The Tapping Solution, will explain how tapping can be effective for pain, stress, and anxiety.

title: 5-Minute Tapping Technique with Nick Ortner
body:
Now that you know the fundamentals of tapping, what areas of your life do you want to begin to release? In this video, Nick Ortner, creator, and author of The Tapping Solution, guides you through a universal tapping sequence for any stresses and anxieties. Within five minutes you will develop the tools to use in your daily life and start healing from the inside out. 

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— The importance of recognizing and how to understand your current stress levels.
— 8 tapping points and the corresponding Tapping technique.
— A sample script you can use at any time.
— How to tune into thought patterns to acknowledge and overcome their hold on you.
— Ways you can begin to release these feelings.
— Why you should pay attention to what is happening and explore the process.
— How you can use tapping to uncover what is happening in your life.
teaser: Now that you know the fundamentals of tapping, what areas of your life do you want to begin to release? Nick Ortner guides you through a universal tapping sequence for any stresses and anxieties.

title: Understanding Limiting Beliefs with Shelly Lefkoe
body:
What is getting in your way? In this Masterclass lesson, Shelly Lefkoe, author, parenting expert, and co-founder of The Lefkoe Institute, takes us on a journey of exploring our limiting beliefs and how we can remove meaning in the moment. By removing emotion and meaning from a negative experience, we foster our ability to conquer the beliefs that limit us.

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— How thoughts and experiences become our beliefs.
— Ways that our childhood experiences shape our experience of the world.
— Why and how we give some things meaning, but not others.
— How beliefs can rule our lives and why we instinctively keep ourselves safe.
— How we can remove a pattern by addressing a belief.
— Ways you can remove your emotion from a difficult situation.
teaser: What is getting in your way? Shelly Lefkoe, author, parenting expert, and co-founder of The Lefkoe Institute, takes us on a journey of exploring our limiting beliefs and learning how we can conquer them.

title: 3 Steps to Overcoming Adversity & Limiting Beliefs with Sonia Ricotti
body:
What does it take to help you bounce back? In this Masterclass lesson, Sonia Ricotti, best-selling author, motivational speaker, and bounce back expert, shares her story of adversity and the three steps she took to overcome the stress and live the life she dreamed. Achieving your goals is a matter of shifting the story you tell yourself. Whether it’s relationships or money, we are all impacted by our limiting beliefs.

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— How complaining, sorrow, anger, and resentment prevent you from bouncing back.
— 3-step process to reprogram your mind.
— Why you need to start focussing on what you want and what you want to create in life.
— Why the power of thought is vital for resilience.
— How to unpack the stories we tell ourselves, and ways we can change that story.
— How to raise your vibrational frequency to a state of love, joy, and gratitude.
— Exercises to begin rewriting your story.
— Ways to attract more positivity into your life.
— The importance of forgiveness and meditation for your happiness.
teaser: What does it take to help you bounce back? Sonia Ricotti shares her story of adversity and the three steps she took to overcome the stress and live the life she dreamed.

title: Understanding and Healing Trauma with Dawson Church
body:
Have you always wanted to develop a deeper understanding of your trauma? Why does it manifest in your body in a certain way? What steps can you take to heal? In this Masterclass lesson, Dawson Church, PhD, award-winning author and epigenetic researcher, explores the development of trauma in the brain and why certain techniques work better than others. In the hundreds of kinds of therapy, the best kind is the one that works for you.

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— The two kinds of trauma and what sets them apart.
— How developmental trauma is woven into the neural fabric of the emotional midbrain.
— Techniques you can use to break through underlying complex trauma.
— How some theories can retraumatize you and do more harm than good.
— Why energy techniques are crucial for healing trauma.
— How tapping works on the brain and the importance of touch in healing trauma.
teaser: Have you always wanted to develop a deeper understanding of your trauma? Dawson Church explores the development of trauma in the brain and why certain techniques work better than others.

title: 10-Minute Tapping Technique with Jennifer Partridge
body:
How has your journey into tapping been? Have you been using it to explore the deepest parts of yourself? Or can you feel resistance? After telling her heart-wrenching story in Transcendence Season 2, Jennifer Partridge shares her gift of tapping with you in this video. Trust the process; you are worthy of this love.

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— Why the feelings that come up are more important than ‘doing it right’.
— How to become aware of the challenges in your life.
— Different ways you can adapt a tapping script to suit your needs.
— Alternative tapping points you can use on the body, including the individual finger tapping points.
— How you can realize and accept your body’s needs.
— Techniques you can use to release resistance that arises.
teaser: How has your journey into tapping been? After telling her heart-wrenching story in Season 2 of Transcendence, Jennifer Partridge shares her gift of tapping with you in this video.

title: Benefits of Plant-Based Compounds with Dave Asprey
body:
Have you always been curious about what makes herbs and spices so magical? Polyphenols, the compound responsible for the rich color, is also the source of the incredible healing properties they hold. In this video, Dave Asprey, entrepreneur, author, and biohacker, explores the hidden health benefits in a variety of everyday foods. 

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— Foods that contain the richest sources of polyphenols and ways to boost your intake.
— How polyphenols affect your cells with anti-aging and performance enhancing compounds.
— The surprising health benefits of coffee and why you should be having more of it.
— How tobacco, in the right dose,  might actually be good for certain health ailments such as - Alzheimer’s disease.
— Why your body needs to be functioning well for your mind to change.
— The healing qualities of charcoal and clay, and how indigenous cultures have used them to remove toxins for thousands of years.
teaser: Have you always been curious about what makes herbs and spices so magical? Dave Asprey explains that polyphenols, the compound responsible for the rich color, is also the source of the incredible healing properties.

title: Using Plant Medicine to Heal with Nick Polizzi
body:
The healing properties of plant medicine are abundant, but how do we know where to begin? What plants are the right ones for us? Author Nick Polizzi, of The Sacred Science, takes us on a journey deeper into the realm of healing through all that nature provides us.

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— Surprising health benefits of plants growing on your lawn.
— Different ways to include healing plants in your food.
— Why medicinal mushrooms are making a comeback and where you can find them.
— How nature has an innate way of knowing and providing you with the antidotes you need.
— Why you should be using adaptogens to reduce stress in the body and ways that herbalism can support your meditation journey.
— How to find your own personal plant allies.
— The role of cannabis in healing pain and how this is a gateway to discovering plant medicine.
teaser: The healing properties of plant medicine are abundant, but how do we know where to begin? What plants are the right ones for us? Nick Polizzi takes us on a journey deeper into the realm of healing through all that nature provides us.

title: Attuning to a Positive Mindset with Dawson Church
body:
What is the first thing you do when you wake in the morning? Do you rise gently and connect to the universe around you, or do you check your phone like an overwhelming majority of the global population? In this Masterclass lesson, Dawson Church, PhD, award-winning author and epigenetic researcher, explores the realm of possibilities when you tune your consciousness into the realm of the universe. 

In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— The beneficial hormonal shifts in your body from avoiding your phone.
— How social media and the news cycle fills our minds of negativity.
— How we are giving control of our health, thought, and beliefs to people outside of us.
— Why our perception of the world is altered by the comparison of how the world is, to how the news tells us the world is.
— How to attune to your non-local mind and reality upon waking, and why this is full of love, abundance, and joy.
teaser: What is the first thing you do when you wake in the morning? Rise gently and connect to the universe around you, or check your phone? Dawson Church explores the realm of possibilities when you tune your consciousness into the universe.

title: Asking Empowering Questions with Michael Beckwith
body:
What questions do you ask yourself in times of hardship? Do you find the answers you seek? In this Masterclass lesson, Rev. Michael Beckwith, a New Thought minister, best-selling author, and founder of the Agape International Spiritual Center, guides you through the importance of asking yourself empowering questions.
 
In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:
 
— The means of survival throughout times of darkness.
— How to give birth to the qualities you need for peace of mind, if this were to last forever.
— Ways of pulling yourself out of wishful thinking.
— Why you should be asking yourself empowering questions.
— How to let the divine universal presence answer any question you ask.
— Why potential is always bigger than the problem.
teaser: What questions do you ask yourself in times of hardship? Do you find the answers you seek? Rev. Michael Beckwith guides you through the importance of asking yourself empowering questions.

title: Finding Your Bliss with Artie Wu
body:
What roadblocks are getting in the way of finding your bliss? In this lesson, Artie Wu, healer and founder of Preside Life, embarks on a journey of acceptance and rediscovering the parts of yourself that have been locked away.
 
In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— Why your deepest wound is the source of your greatest gift in the world.
— How to form your complete bliss circuit and the benefits that flow from it.
— That the ultimate form of soothing is following your bliss, and how you can inspire others to do the same.
— Ways to identify the board members that exist inside your brain, and how the key to healing is finding the lost board members and accepting them fully.
— What your innate safety code is and how it shuts parts of you out.
— How meditation is the key to unlocking parts of yourself.
— Why a deeper understanding of unconditional love is the source of bliss.
teaser: What roadblocks are getting in the way of finding your bliss? Artie Wu, healer and founder of Preside Life, embarks on a journey of acceptance and rediscovering the parts of yourself that have been locked away.

title: Spiritual Lessons with Michael Beckwith
body:
What are you seeking in life? Where do you begin to find it? In this lesson, Rev. Michael Beckwith, a New Thought minister, best-selling author, and founder of the Agape International Spiritual Center, invites you on a journey of the spiritual lessons he has learned in his life. See this as a pathway to your awakening.
 
In this exclusive extended interview, you will learn:

— Play and pray have a similar vibration without attachment to outcome, and why you should enter the tedious with the spirit of play.
— How to let go of your concern of what others think of you.
— The importance of acknowledging fear and taking it with you, and how to turn it into excitement and enthusiasm.
— How the universe supports your growth and guides you to love without agenda.  
— Why service is the pathway to awakening and how this differs from martyrdom.
— How to find happiness, meaning, and long-term joy.
teaser: What are you seeking in life? Where do you begin to find it? Rev. Michael Beckwith invites you on a journey of the spiritual lessons he has learned in his life. See this as a pathway to your awakening.
